mapper.update: UPDATE HOTELSTOCK INNER JOIN PARTNERSTOCK ON HOTELSTOCK.ITEMID = PARTNERSTOCK.ITEMID SET HOTELSTOCK.ORDERSTATUS = '발주완료', HOTELSTOCK.CURRENTSTOCK = HOTELSTOCK.CURRENTSTOCK + PARTNERSTOCK.UNIT WHERE HOTELSTOCK.ORDERSTATUS = '발주중'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STOCKMONTH (USERNUM, ITEMID, USERDATE) SELECT NULL, ITEMID, NOW() FROM HOTELSTOCK WHERE ORDERSTATUS = '발주중';
